kizuna_ecology_a_02:
Have you gotten used to things here at the
academy, [trnm:0]?[npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_03a: Great! Glad to see you’re having fun.[npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_03b:
Well, don’t worry. I’m sure you’ll get a hang of
things soon! In the meantime, feel free to come\r
see me if you need help with anything![npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_04: Oh! Have you been using the Pokédex app?[npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_05:
I’m, uh, hehe...I’m the one who made it,
you know.[npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_06:
Every time someone using the app catches a
Pokémon, that data gets sent to me.\c
It’s really helping with my Pokémon research![npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_07:
So be sure to catch any new Pokémon you find
and work on filling in your Pokédex.[npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_08:
For your first goal, let’s aim for, say...30! Register
30 Pokémon in your app![npcn:2A]
kizuna_ecology_a_09: Let me know once you’ve done so![npcn:2A]
